description: AC Milan boss Sergio Conceicao said Monday's Italian Super Cup comeback win over Inter Milan has a "special flavour" as he capped off an incredible first week in charge of the club.
title: Italian Super Cup final: Milan's win over Inter has 'special flavour' says Conceicao
title_page: Italian Super Cup final: Milan's win over Inter has 'special flavour' says Conceicao - BBC Sport
maintext:
New AC Milan manager Sergio Conceicao said the Italian Super Cup comeback win against Inter Milan has a "special flavour" as he capped a dream first week in charge.
The former Lazio, Inter Milan and Parma midfielder replaced Paulo Fonseca in charge of Milan on 30 December.
He oversaw a 2-1 win over Juventus in his first game in charge to set up a Super Cup final with their city rivals.
Inter took the lead when Lautaro Martinez beat Mike Maignan at his near post at the end of the first half then Mehdi Taremi doubled their advantage early in the second period.
However Milan responded quickly by pulling one back five minutes later when Theo Hernandez scored directly from a free-kick.
The final looked set for penalties when Christian Pulisic found the bottom corner to equalise 10 minutes from time.
But substitute Tammy Abraham completed a sensational comeback win with a simple tap-in from close range in the 93rd minute to clinch the trophy for Milan.
